sentences.sentence: He was stretchered off the pitch with a broken leg.
sentences.translation: 他腿骨折了，从球场上抬了下去。

sentences.sentence: I was close by as Lester was stretchered into the ambulance.
sentences.translation: 莱斯特被用担架送进那辆救护车时我在旁边。

sentences.sentence: He was stretchered off after lengthy treatment which held up the match.
sentences.translation: 在长时间的治疗后，他被担架抬下场。
